item.title: Ressources
item.author: Etienne Burdet
item.description:
Software Linup

  • Atom : switching from Emacs, still using emacs for a few minor modes (mainly GNU-Octave).
  • TeXmaker : mainly because it’s cross platform and provides super easy access to multiple compile options, shortcuts etc. (I hope a nice Atom package shows up though).
  • Freeplane
  • GNU-Octave : who needs Matlab ? Still mostly compatible with it.

Website

Barebone, without content. Hugo stock Hyde theme, with very few tweaks. Good for a lazy clone. Deploy script is obviously for github hosting.
